content: this is the mini version of my penguin amigurumi 2 the pattern is different from the original pattern pattern includes written instructions and photo tutorial for magic_ring & color changes pdf has 6 pages you will need ♥ b/2 25mm hook ♥ worsted weight yarn in pink white and orange ♥ pair of 9mm safety eyes ♥ keychain ♥ yarn needle ♥ stuffing this penguin stands about 2 5 6cm tall results will vary depending on your gauge and your yarn & hook choice **join the adorably kawaii 1 group to share fo s made from my patterns ask questions join in cals/kals and more ** 1 http //www ravelry com/groups/adorably-kawaii 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/penguin-amigurumi-2/
